trends: There have been no other sightings in Menominee
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswe were sititng in our backyard looking at the stars. We saw a bright roundish object whos color seemed to brighten and darken as it flew. It was starlike but moving to fast to be a shooting star. Was moving very fast through the night sky. Seemed to hover over our house before it flashed into disaperance. We were both really schocked and spent quite a bit of time trying to rationlize what the object could be.
